titleStmt.title: A Catalogue of ancient and modern musick books, both vocal and instrumental with divers treatises about the same, and several musical instruments : as also of a small collection of books, in history, divinity, and physick, which will be sold at Dowing's Coffee-House in Popes-Head Alley near the Royal Exchange, on Thursday, December the 17th, 1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
